string.value: #p1012111#'s expression darkened after receiving the #t4000009#s. Is it something serious? Talk to #b#p1012111##k.

#p1012111# says that something similar has also happened with the #o1210102#s near #m100000000# and that the cuprit is probably a puppet that looks like a mushroom. He says that much of the problem should be alleviated if you hunt #r100#k #r#o2220100#s#k and retrieve the #b#t4032459##k... Retrieve the #t4032459# and bring it to #p1040000#.

#o9101004##r #a225241##k
#i4032459# #t4032459# #b#c4032459# / 1#k
#p1040000# seems worried about the seriousness of the situation.
I'm sorry. I was thinking about something else. Similar things have been happening around #m100000000# lately. Have you heard of the #o9300274#s?
They used to be normal mushrooms but they turned strange. Your situation sounds similar. Luckily we know the solution to this problem thanks to someone who helped us before.
It you hunt about #r100 #o2220100#s#k and recover the #b#t4032459##k that they drop, it cools down the situation. Can you recover the #t4032459# and deliver it to #p1040000#?
Okay, please do your best. #o2220100#'s puppet probably won't drop that easily. You're going to need patience.
Is it too hard? I heard rumors that you eliminated #o2220100#s... Hmm. Maybe #p1010100# was mistaken.
Oh, you're here. So what did #p1012111# say? Why are the #o2220100#s acting so weird? Huh? This is a...puppet?
This puppet is what's causing the #o2220100# to change? That's difficult to believe, but since an expert is saying it...I guess I'll have to believe it. In any case, thanks.
Did you not go to #p1040000# yet? You just need to hunt about #r100 #o2220100#s#k and recover the #b#t4032459##k before bringing it to #b#p1040000##k.
Oh, you're here. So what did #p1012111# say? Why are the #o2220100#s suddenly become like that? Huh? #b#t4032459##k? I think I need to see this puppet myself.
